subScenes.name: 初次问候
subScenes.description: 前台接待，初步打招呼并表达来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey there! Welcome to FitLife Gym. How can I help you today?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！欢迎来到FitLife健身房，今天有什么可以帮你的？

responses.text: Hi! I'm new here and I'd like to check out membership options.
responses.text_cn: 嗨！我是新手，想看看会员方案。

responses.text: Hi, I'm looking for a gym membership. What do you offer?
responses.text_cn: 你好，我想办张会员卡，你们有什么？

responses.text: Hi. Membership info?

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简洁句表达来意，避免冗长

qaPairs.speakerText: Awesome! We’ve got plans for everyone — from casual users to serious lifters. What’s your goal?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太好了！我们有适合各种人的计划，你的目标是什么？

responses.text: I just wanna get fit and lose a few pounds. Nothing too intense.
responses.text_cn: 我想塑形减点重，别太激烈就行。

responses.text: I’m trying to build muscle and stay consistent.
responses.text_cn: 我想增肌，保持规律训练。

responses.text: Stay healthy.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简单目标词表达需求，不需专业术语

subScenes.name: 询问设施
subScenes.description: 了解健身房设备与附加服务

qaPairs.speakerText: We’ve got cardio machines, free weights, and a yoga studio. Oh, and we offer free towel service and showers.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们有有氧器械、自由重量区和瑜伽室，还提供免费毛巾和淋浴。

responses.text: Do you have a pool? I’d love to swim sometimes.
responses.text_cn: 你们有泳池吗？我想偶尔游泳。

responses.text: Any personal trainers available?
Showers are a plus!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Do you have...?直接询问关键设施

qaPairs.speakerText: We’ve got certified trainers — you can book sessions for $25/hour. And no, no pool, but we’ve got a great sauna.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们有认证教练，25美元一小时，没有泳池，但有很棒的桑拿。

responses.text: I’ll skip the trainer for now — just wanna try the sauna first.
responses.text_cn: 先不请教练了，我想先试试桑拿。

responses.text: Sauna’s cool, but I might book a session next week.
responses.text_cn: 桑拿不错，下周可能约个教练。

responses.text: Sauna? Nice.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I’ll...或I might...表达意愿，语气自然

subScenes.name: 确认价格
subScenes.description: 比较不同会员方案并询问优惠

qaPairs.speakerText: Our basic plan is $30/month, no contract. Premium is $50 with access to classes and sauna.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 基础计划每月30美元，无合约；高级50美元，含课程和桑拿。

responses.text: Can I get a discount if I pay quarterly?
responses.text_cn: 如果我按季度付费能打折吗？

responses.text: What’s the difference between basic and premium?
Basic’s fine.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Can I...?询问优惠，更礼貌有效

qaPairs.speakerText: Yeah, if you pay 3 months upfront, you get 1 month free — that’s like $22.50/month.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 对，预付三个月送一个月，相当于每月22.5美元。

responses.text: That’s a deal! I’ll take the basic plan then.
responses.text_cn: 这优惠不错！那我就选基础版。

responses.text: Hmm, I’m not sure yet — can I think about it?
responses.text_cn: 我还不确定，能让我想想吗？

responses.text: Free month? Sweet!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用That’s a deal!或I’ll take...直接做决定

subScenes.name: 参观体验
subScenes.description: 请求参观设施并确认开放时间

qaPairs.speakerText: Want a quick tour? We’re open 24/7, so you can come anytime.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 要参观一下吗？我们24小时营业，随时都能来。

responses.text: Yes, please! Can I see the weight area first?
responses.text_cn: 好的，麻烦带我去看看举重区？

responses.text: Sure, show me around.
Not now, thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Can I see...?礼貌请求参观具体区域

qaPairs.speakerText: The weights are right over there — and the cardio machines are by the windows. Oh, and the locker rooms are through that door.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 举重区在那边，有氧器械靠窗，更衣室在那扇门后。

responses.text: Perfect! I’ll sign up after I check everything out.
Thanks, I’m good — I’ll call later.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，我先走了，稍后联系。

responses.text: Looks good.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I’ll sign up...表达明确意向，促进成交

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别
subScenes.description: 结束咨询，表达感谢并约定后续

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for your time — we’re here if you have more questions!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 非常感谢你的时间，有疑问随时来找我们！

responses.text: I really appreciate it! I’ll be back tomorrow.
responses.text_cn: 太感谢了！我明天就回来。

responses.text: Cool, thanks! I’ll text you if I decide.
responses.text_cn: 好的，谢谢！我决定后发消息。

responses.text: Thanks!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I’ll be back / I’ll text you表达后续行动

qaPairs.speakerText: Awesome! Just swing by anytime — we’ll get you set up in 5 minutes.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太好了！随时来，5分钟就帮你办好。

responses.text: Will do! See you tomorrow.
Got it, thanks again!
Bye!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Will do!或See you...自然结束对话
